intro.title: Multi-Disciplinary
intro.subtitle: Professional
intro.description: Specializing in Data Analysis, Graphic Design, and Software Development. Transforming ideas into impactful solutions through creative and analytical expertise.

about.title: About
about.description: A versatile professional with expertise spanning data analysis, graphic design, and software development. I bring analytical thinking, creative vision, and technical excellence to every project.
about.dataAnalysisDescription: Transforming complex data into actionable insights using statistical analysis, machine learning, and advanced modern visualization techniques.
about.graphicDesignDescription: Creating compelling visual identities, marketing materials, and user interfaces that communicate effectively and engage audiences.
about.softwareDevelopmentDescription: Building robust web applications and software solutions using modern technologies and best practices for optimal performance and user experience.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis &
dataAnalysis.description: Leveraging data to drive business decisions through statistical analysis, machine learning, and compelling visualizations that tell meaningful stories.

salesDashboard.title: Sales Performance Dashboard
salesDashboard.description: Interactive dashboard analyzing sales trends, customer behavior, and revenue optimization using Python and Tableau.

customerSegmentation.title: Customer Segmentation Analysis
customerSegmentation.description: Machine learning-based customer segmentation to improve marketing strategies and customer retention.

predictiveAnalytics.title: Predictive Analytics Model
predictiveAnalytics.description: Time series forecasting model for inventory management and demand prediction using advanced statistical methods.

graphicDesign.title: Graphic
graphicDesign.description: Creating visually compelling designs that communicate effectively and leave lasting impressions. From brand identity to digital marketing materials.

brandIdentity.title: Brand Identity System
brandIdentity.description: Complete brand identity design including logo, color palette, typography, and brand guidelines for a tech startup.

marketingCampaign.title: Marketing Campaign Design
marketingCampaign.description: Multi-channel marketing materials including print ads, social media graphics, and web banners for product launch.

interactivePortfolio.title: Interactive Portfolio
interactivePortfolio.description: Interactive PDF portfolio showcasing a curated selection of my best work. Focused on intuitive navigation and an engaging user experience.

printDesign.title: Print Design Collection
printDesign.description: Print materials including brochures, posters, and packaging design with attention to typography and layout.

socialMedia.title: Social Media Graphics
socialMedia.description: Engaging social media content design for various platforms including Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn campaigns.

illustration.title: Illustration Series
illustration.description: Custom illustrations for editorial content, websites, and marketing materials with unique artistic style.

coding.title: Coding
coding.description: Building robust, scalable applications using modern technologies and best practices. From web applications to mobile apps and data science tools.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Responsive portfolio website showcasing projects with modern design and smooth animations.

ecommerce.description: Full-featured e-commerce website with user authentication, payments, and admin dashboard.

taskManager.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration features.

cvBuilder.description: Interactive CV builder for creating and managing professional resumes.

gameStats.description: Basketball game statistics application with real-time data visualization and user analytics.
